2023-12-04_to_2023-12-10.text: @TheORSociety @DoloresRomeroM I spy Nadia Papamichail and Ruth Kaufman in the photo! The former I met @INFORMS2023 in Phoenix and the latter at EURO Dublin in 2019.

2023-11-13_to_2023-11-19.text: Proud of the @umassinforms student chapter & the great teamwork of the Chapter Officers, student members & faculty supporters. This nice post has photos of the @INFORMS Magna Cum Laude Award at the chapter received @INFORMS2023 with photos of a celebration at the BIH recently‚Ä¶

2023-11-06_to_2023-11-12.text: I had the opportunity to see one of the co-authors, Alexandra Newman, give a great presentation of the work during last month's @INFORMS2023 @INFORMS annual meeting.

2023-10-30_to_2023-11-05.text: @TheRedLine_pod I took the train recently during my @INFORMS2023 conference visit, and it was pretty good. I'd have preferred a little bit more speed given how far it goes, and a little late running hours, especially from the airport.

2023-10-23_to_2023-10-29.text: Thanks to @UMassINFORMS President @Hassani_Dana for writing up such a nice recap of @INFORMS2023 in Phoenix! Hard to believe that we have been back from that great @INFORMS #orms #analytics conference for only a week and a half. Lots of nice photos posted https://t.co/Pbxh5D3q45 https://t.co/X8sR8GXqlQ

Plant the seeds of Innovation! 

I can‚Äôt wait to see what wildflowers bloom from our @Kinaxis special seed postcard that we gave out at @INFORMS2023. 

Like our #supplychain platform, we protect and give back to Mother Nature. 

Stay tuned to see what blooms. ü™¥üåº https://t.co/gPaGaiU5e3

We had an amazing time in Phoenix at @INFORMS2023  last week!üåµHuge thanks to everyone we spoke with at last week‚Äôs INFORMS conference!üöÄSpecial shout-out to those who attended our workshop and tutorials; your engagement was remarkable. Let‚Äôs keep this momentum going!#informs2023 https://t.co/eaS7o2GJfv
@Supernetworks @INFORMS2023 @PomsSociety I‚Äôm sure it is going to be a great talk!

2023-10-16_to_2023-10-22.text: Thanks to all those who organize conferences and sessions within them. Soon after I returned from the great @INFORMS2023 I received invitations to speak at the @PomsSociety conference in Minneapolis, which I accepted (it's an easy one-legged flight for me).
Last summer day in Phoenix - Had a great time catching up with friends @INFORMS2023 and enjoyed all the questions and interests to my research about Indian power systems. https://t.co/bLyBueUd7S
Congratulations to current Berkeley IEOR student Sylvia Li (MEng IEOR '24) for being honored with the 2023 Amazon SCOT scholarship at @informs2023 @INFORMS #INFORMS2023 @FungInstitute

Thanks to all who took part in @INFORMS2023. There were over 6,000 of us at this conference in Phoenix from all continents except for Antarctica. Below is a collage constructed. Thanks for the memories! @informs @isenbergumass @umassamherst #orms #analytics https://t.co/16B0uOMqB8

Great to be back in @townofamherst with the vibrant foliage! It was nice to see my @umassamherst students again after the conference. One of my @isenbergumass PHD students covered my class on Tuesday when I was @informs2023 in Phoenix. https://t.co/R71z6K9ojc

As we are leaving Phoenix, AZ, I would like to thank the organizers of @INFORMS2023 and all colleagues for the very successful #informs2023 event. It was worth the long flight... https://t.co/jCehTkjycv
@houra_m @INFORMS2023 I remember those hats! Phoenix 2012.
@simoptim @INFORMS2023 @INFORMS So sorry for all the travel travails!

@Supernetworks @INFORMS2023 @INFORMS My flight back from Phoenix  got delayed several hours & landed in St. Louis at 2 AM. We have a two-hr drive from there to Rolla. On the way, the car started showing maintenance is due: B12 code! Wow, was just glad to be home at 4 AM‚Äîand there‚Äôs an exam now in a couple of hrs üòä

It was very nice seeing friends and colleagues @INFORMS2023 in Phoenix, AZ. It brought back memories of my first-ever INFORMS conference, 11 years ago, which also happened in Phoenix! Can you tell whether the photo is from 2012 or 2023? üòâü§† #ThrowbackThursday  #INFORMS2023 https://t.co/suOq7kAOeQ

While we are all leaving Phoenix, AZ, I would like to thank the @INFORMS2023 staff, the #informs2023 organizing committee, and all (academic and business) colleagues for a superb event. In total, 6,500+ showed up here. See you all in Seattle, WA. https://t.co/uZZckMlWhT

Thanks to the organizers of the @informs2023 conference in Phoenix. Hope that everyone makes it back to their homes safely. Amazing to have conferees from Africa at this @Informs conference, from Singapore, Shanghai, Hong Kong, Sydney & many other parts of the globe. Off to teach‚Ä¶

2023-08-28_to_2023-09-03.text: Join us at @INFORMS2023 to learn more about integrating operations research with artificial intelligence from panelist and CAIS co-director Bistra Dilkina on October 15th! Final day for early registration: https://t.co/JCcdBmQ9FP. See you there! https://t.co/5HjaZlQCAw

Join us at @INFORMS2023 to learn more about optimizing nonlinear functions over combinatorial regions on October 16th! Final day for early registration: https://t.co/sxT7AKGwC5. See you there! https://t.co/ggRTaGcbtZ

Join us at @INFORMS2023 to learn more about interdicting wildlife trafficking networks on October 15th! Final day for early registration: https://t.co/xc2tfQG8eU. See you there! https://t.co/wB9XCzJlwx
Join us at @INFORMS2023 to learn more about distributionally robust optimization on October 18th! Final day for early registration: https://t.co/sxT7AKGwC5. See you there! https://t.co/4lujBUww98

Join us at @INFORMS2023 to learn more about critical systems that allocate scarce resources to satisfy basic needs on October 17th! Final day for early registration: https://t.co/sxT7AKGwC5. See you there! https://t.co/ICwvbUN8ys

Join us at @INFORMS2023 to learn more about the multistage fair classification problem on October 15th! The final day for early registration is tomorrow: https://t.co/tsFHPwzNuL. See you there! https://t.co/WowfOf7gyH

Join us at @INFORMS2023 to learn more about preference elicitation algorithms on October 15th! The final day for early registration is tomorrow: https://t.co/8OAQbScuRp. See you there! https://t.co/DLnQqgYWhC

Join us at @INFORMS2023 to learn more about the problem of allocating scarce societal resources to heterogeneous individuals on October 17th! The final day for early registration is tomorrow:  https://t.co/xc2tfQG8eU. See you there! https://t.co/GVU7HUhP8u

Join us at @INFORMS2023 to learn more about learning optimal classification trees that are robust to distribution shifts on October 16th! The final day for early registration is tomorrow: https://t.co/xc2tfQG8eU. See you there! https://t.co/uwQpeFXIB7
